section.title: How do I create BIRT report in OFBiz.
section.para: Create Data Set that use Scripted Data Source
Bind report's element to Data Set

section.title: How do I add script code to report.
section.para: Report can use delegator, dispatcher and security object in script.
Report can use same classpath with ofbiz.

section.title: How do I send parameter to report.
section.para: If report be rendered through view map, you can send parameter through attribute of request object, attribute's name "birtParameters" that is map.
If report be rendered through e-mail, you can send parameter through service's parameter name is birtParameters.

section.title: How do I send report through e-mail.
section.para: Report can sent through email by using sendBirtMail service.

section.title: How do I embed report to screen.
section.para: Report can embeded in screen by using jsp tag, viewer and report tag, that can use in ftl file.

section.title: What content's type that report supported.
How do I change report content's type
section.para: If report be rendered through view map, can set content's type at content-type attribute of view map.
If report be rendered through e-mail, can set content's type at service's parameter name is birtContentType.
